Detailed Description

A special Group node that is a top-level container for scene graphs.

void render ( int  pass,
int  index = 0 
) const [protected, virtual]

Render this object.

Note: World should be rendered via all rendering pass. pass=0: render background and camera. pass=1: render lights. pass=2: render objets.

Reimplemented from Node.
